description: Raw almonds are blended up with roasted red peppers and seasonings to make this creamy spreadable vegan cheese.
keywords: cheese spread recipe, Smoked Almond Cheddar Spread, vegan cheese spread, vegan spread recipe
name: Smoked Almond Cheddar Spread
recipeIngredient: 1/2 to 3/4 cup pimientos from a jar (plus 1/2 to 3/4 cup packing liquid)

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the almonds well. Place them in water in a medium bowl. Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Drain the almonds. In the bowl of a food processor, place the almonds, pimientos, nutritional yeast, salt, garlic powder, and 1/4 cup pimiento liquid. Process until the mixture is well incorporated.
Remove the lid and test the cheese for texture and salt content. If you want a smoother spread, add pimiento liquid in small increments and process again. Add more salt if needed.
Serve this with crackers and fresh pears.
